briefdescription.para: Sets the activation status of AMD Fluid Motion Frames.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the activation status of AMD Fluid Motion Frames.

entry.para: The new AMD Fluid Motion Frames state. Set true to enable AMD Fluid Motion Frames. Set false to disable AMD Fluid Motion Frames.

detaileddescription.para: If the state of AMD Fluid Motion Frames is successfully set, ADLX_OK is returned. If the state of AMD Fluid Motion Frames is not successfully set, an error code is returned. Refer to ADLX_RESULT for success codes and error codes.
AMD Fluid Motion Frames is a frame generating feature to achieve higher in-game frame rates.
AMD Fluid Motion Frames cannot be simultaneously enabled with AMD Radeon Chill.
If AMD Fluid Motion Frames is enabled, the mutually exclusive features are automatically disabled. When a mutually exclusive feature is re-enabled, its previous configuration settings are restored.
